- Admin interface for creating phone bookings with full booking details

- Customer payment page for card saving (no immediate charge) and digital signature
- Email notifications to customers and admins
- Integration with existing payment tracker (awaiting_card status)
- Calendar highlighting for phone bookings (amber color)
- Automatic link expiration via cron job
- Prevention of form submission when no containers available
